editor.chain().focus().unsetHighlight().run();// walk the document, analyze paragraphs, list items, and headings
const{doc}=editor.state;doc.descendants((node,pos)=>{const isAnalyzable=node.type.name==="paragraph"||node.type.name==="list_item"||node.type.name==="heading";if(!isAnalyzable)return;const text=node.textContent;if(!text)return;// split node text into sentences
const parts=text.match(/[^.!?…]+[.!?…]*/g)||[];let searchFrom=0;for(const raw of parts){const s=raw.trim();if(!s){searchFrom+=raw.length;continue;}const{wordCount,syllableCount,grade}=analyzeSentence(s);const fre=206.835-1.015*wordCount-84.6*(syllableCount/Math.max(1,wordCount));const color=colorFor(fre,wordCount);if(color){const startInNode=text.indexOf(s,searchFrom);if(startInNode!==-1){const from=pos+1+startInNode;const to=from+s.length;const tip=`FRE ${fre.toFixed(1)}, ${wordCount} words, Grade ${grade.toFixed(1)}, try splitting`;editor.chain().focus().setTextSelection({from,to}).setHighlight({color,HTMLAttributes:{title:tip,style:HL_STYLES[color]}}).run();searchFrom=startInNode+s.length;}else{searchFrom+=raw.length;}}else{searchFrom+=raw.length;}}});// put caret at end

List"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex flex-wrap gap-4 text-xs mb-2",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex items-center gap-1",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"legend-red w-3 h-3 border inline-block"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"Very hard, FRE < 30"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex items-center gap-1",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"legend-yellow w-3 h-3 border inline-block"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"Hard, 30 to 50"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex items-center gap-1",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"legend-blue w-3 h-3 border inline-block"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:["Long, ",LONG_SENTENCE_WORDS,"+ words"]})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex flex-wrap gap-4 text-sm",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bg-gray-100 px-2 py-1 rounded",children:["Words: ",stats.wordCount]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bg-gray-100 px-2 py-1 rounded",children:["Sentences: ",stats.sentenceCount]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bg-green-100 px-2 py-1 rounded",children:["Grade: ",stats.grade.toFixed(1)]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bg-blue-100 px-2 py-1 rounded",children:["Ease: ",stats.ease.toFixed(1)]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(EditorContent,{editor:editor})]});}
